titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: <*> note next to address = crossed out <*> note under Feb 12 = unclear s2: <*> Nov 25 = illegible note after return date <*> faded or erased note at bottom, "Orange & Lemon" first title? s3: <*> Nov 17 = "Bring Bring"? <*> Dec 14 = "Pefilfloss"? s4: <*> note at bottom = "Tone"? s5: <*> July 29 = "Connorfleur"? <*> handwriting impossible on much of card s7: <*> Ap 15 = "Padden"?

1 mo 1 vol 12 Dep 20 not refunded
Oct 11 Chaucer vol IV Oct 25 Oct 25 Mont St Michel & Chartres (0.50) Nov 3 Nov 3 Chaucer vol IV renewed Nov 20 Nov 20 Aesthetics renewed BB Ren. " Chaucer vol 4 Jan 2 Nov 11 Jan 2 Surry Poems Jan 14th Dec 11 Jan 2 Pavannes + Divisions Jan 22 1923 ( wants Marianne Moore) ---- 12v Jan 22 Responsibilities Jan. 28 R. to Jan 11th Jan 28 Cutting of an Agate Feb 1 = 12f Feb 1 Specimens of Early English part 1 Feb to Feb 11 Feb 12 Poems. Feb. 27 12 Ren wants to know if <*> is Feb 11 = no on English Translation of Laforgue March 11 Feb 27 Instigations March 10 1924 12v March 10 Plays & Controversies, Yeats March 24 Ren March 11 March 24 Analysis of Mind April 15 April 11 April 15 Poems 1918-21 Pound Ap. 25 1924 12v " 25 Webster & Tourneur May 12 Ren April 11 May 12 Principles of English Prosody May 22 March 11 Criterion 0.25 1924 12v May 26 Later Poems June 11 Ren to June 11th (over) 1 vol = 12
